author: ryanleeschneider
content: Will Altair light clients be usable as the consensus engine for the merge?  I'm thinking for things like running a fleet of eth1 API servers it might make more sense for the consensus layer on each instance to be a light client connected to some internal "full" consensus instances?

author: m.kalinin
content: As far as I can see, light client committee votes for the head of the chain it has seen for the previous slot, so, it's one slot behind full nodes. Also, light client sync data has `BeaconBlockHeader` and using it as a consensus client would require a corresponding block body request to obtain the execution payload. So, in general it can work but this kind of scheme has implications.
